participant_1.background:
I buy myself nice paper products to make myself feel like a kid again.
i have two cats.
My family is a family of storytellers, and we are all passionate about sharing our stories with the world.
i used to travel the usa playing guitar.
I'm happy to have a beautiful home and get to share my passion for gaming with others.

participant_2.background:
My power tools are my most valued material possessions because they allow me to express my creativity and make my home a better place.
I have a dog named Snowball who keeps me company when I'm recovering from my knee surgery.
I like to watch The Repair Shop when I need some inspiration for my own car repairs.
I fear that I will not be able to help my patients as well as I want to.
i hate tomatoes.

content.text: I'm doing well! I'm a big fan of power tools, and I love to use them to fix things around the house. What about you?
I'm okay, I'm recovering from knee surgery. I have a dog named Snowball who helps keep me company.
Oh, I'm sorry to hear about your knee surgery. I hope you're healing up well. Snowball sounds like a great companion.
Thanks, I'm doing better every day. Snowball is the best!
I'm glad to hear that. What kind of power tools do you like to use the most?
I love using my miter saw and my drill. They're so versatile and can be used for a variety of projects.
Those are great tools! I love using my miter saw too. It's so accurate and makes cutting lumber a breeze.
I know, right? It's my favorite tool.
What kind of projects do you like to work on?
I like to build things around the house, like shelves and bookcases. I also like to work on my car.
That's awesome! I love building things too. I've built a few bookcases and a desk.
Nice! Building things is so satisfying.
It is! It's also a great way to learn new skills.
